misconceptions.inferred_category_name: No conceptual error detected (correct right-rotation with wraparound)
misconceptions.student_thought_process: The student believes that storing the last element, shifting elements from right-to-left, and then placing the saved last element at index 0 will perform a one-position right shift with wraparound.
